alert.note: Alert for Carson; Hutchinson; Moore; Potter; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 12:57AM CDT until April 28 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... Western Roberts County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 1257 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Dumas, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Borger, Fritch, Sunray, Stinnett, Skellytown, Sanford, Lake Meredith and Pringle. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
